titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament declaring that it shall and may be lawfull for all foreigners and strangers in amity with this kingdome to have free trade and commerce to and from the city of London and all other ports and places within any of His Majesties dominions, standing right and keeping fidelity to the King and Parliament : provided that they bring over no quantity of ordnance, armes and other warlike ammunition into Newcastle, Topsham, Falmouth, Dartmouth or any other parts in this kingdome in hostility against the Parliament, or to assist the Irish rebels.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
